name: Good Morning Family
description:
4 Players take up the roles of family members in a very generic sitcom! The show progresses based on how well you are able to handle the struggles of the morning routine. Good luck!

Note: This was made for the Global Game Jam of 2016. This means this is not a finished game by any means. There's no AI to fill in remaining players so you'll need 4 players with each a controller to play.

Controls are controller only. Left joystick to move and 'A' to interact with objects.

  • Stan Loiseaux - Art
  • Juda-ben Gordier - Art
  • Dave van Verdegem - Programming
  • Stijn Delaruelle - Programming
